price: 24. (Se les dirá:) “Coman y beban con placer en recompensa por (las buenas acciones) que realizaron en el pasado”.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā aslaftum fī al-ayāmi al-khāliyati
